QuestionTxt: As you may know, Microsoft was recently charged by the government with anti-trust violations, meaning in violation of our country's laws that prohibit monopolies. The judge in the trial ruled against Microsoft and said that it violated these anti-trust laws, Do you agree or disagree with this ruling or haven't you heard enough to say?
